K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-072:365a-1: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-072:365a-2: yon tan rgyas pa'i rtags su sku mdog zla ba'i gser 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-072:365a-3: shes rab rtags su ral gri bo ti phyag na bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-072:365a-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-072:365a-5: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-072:365a-6: thugs rje'i rtags su sku mdog zla ba'i 'od chags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-072:365a-7: skyon gyis mgos phyag mtshan phyag na padma bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-072:365a-8: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bkra shis gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-072:365a-9: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-072:365a-10: chos nyid mi 'gyur rtags su sku mdog mthing nag sngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-072:365a-11: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med phyag na rdo rje bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-072:365b-0: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i bkra shis gang @365b yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-072:365b-1: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-072:365b-2: rigs gsum gyi bkra shis rdzogs so ////
